title: Tall Gate
summaries: The Tall Gate is a furniture item which is essentially a tall, sliding door that can be opened and closed by pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on it.
Tall Gates differ from traditional <linked>doors</linked> in the following ways:

• The Tall Gate's opening is 5 tiles in height, which is large enough to allow players on mounts to pass through without dismounting (unlike doors, which are only 3 tiles tall).
  • Unlike doors, Tall Gates do not occupy additional space when opened; hence blocks or furniture placed on either side will not prevent them from opening.
  • Tall Gates come in only one variety (unlike doors, which have a different version available for each furniture theme).
